text:
Hello guys
Does somebody know how to edit Recurring billing frequency property fields for Products? Is it possible to add a custom subscription?

Hey all. I will be posting a series of daily bite sized posts on LinkedIn. The premise:
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/mclarenjon_if-you-can-use-ftp-you-can-use-the-HubSpot-activity-6848272264757178368-XeAA|If you can use FTP, you can use the CLI.>
The first post is up now.

[Update] Several posts in the series are live now. Ive linked from post to post so if youre catching up you can get to them
